lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : David Stewart/王嘉尔/Nicholas Mira/Nija Charles/Ric Ocasek
[00:01.000] 作曲 : David Stewart/王嘉尔/Nicholas Mira/Nija Charles/Ric Ocasek
[00:02.000] 制作人 : David Stewart/Nick Mira
[00:08.85]We fell in love on Geary Boulevard
[00:13.40]With the sun coming down on the front of my car
[00:18.28]Felt something like something like an 80’s movie
[00:23.27]Felt something like something like you’d never lose me
[00:28.45]So why we gotta check into the heartbreak hotel
[00:31.63]Oh hell
[00:32.45]You know me better than myself
[00:34.52]I don’t wanna go home, no way
[00:36.55]Without you
[00:37.42]Ain’t gonna be good for my health
[00:39.23]And every roadmap leads straight to your heart
[00:43.35]So I can’t leave you tonight
[00:46.27]No not tonight
[00:48.63]Cause who’s gonna drive you home,
[00:53.06]when you’ve had a crazy day?
[00:58.50]Who’s gonna dry your eyes,
[01:03.55]when your tears fall like the rain?
[01:06.20]Tears fall like the rain
[01:08.87]I think we lived in a homemade video
[01:13.54]But it’s like you and I rewind to the lowest low
[01:18.31]I always thought, always thought we could reverse it
[01:23.29]I always thought, always thought we could be perfect
[01:28.48]So why we gotta check into the heartbreak hotel
[01:31.56]Oh hell
[01:32.42]You know me better than myself
[01:34.34]I don’t wanna go home, no way
[01:36.41]Without you
[01:37.38]Ain’t gonna be good for my health
[01:39.17]And every roadmap leads straight to your heart
[01:43.32]So I can’t leave you tonight
[01:46.34]No not tonight
[01:48.39]Cause who’s gonna drive you home,
[01:53.54]when you’ve had a crazy day?
[01:58.53]Who’s gonna dry your eyes,
[02:03.45]when your tears fall like the rain?
[02:06.06]Tears fall like the rain
[02:08.34]So who’s gonna drive you home?
[02:13.61]Who’s gonna drive you home?
[02:18.30]And I’m 80 miles from going insane
[02:21.56]I’ve been missing, missing those days
[02:24.03]So baby let me love you
[02:28.36]We fell in love on Geary Boulevard
[02:33.54]We fell in deep, we fell so hard
[02:38.53]Maybe one more cruise will make it alright
[02:43.42]While you hold my hand from the passenger’s side
[02:48.69]Cause who’s gonna drive you home,
[02:53.37]when you’ve had a crazy day?
[02:58.58]Who’s gonna dry your eyes,
[03:03.29]when your tears fall like the rain?
[03:06.27]Tears fall like the rain
[03:08.41]So who’s gonna drive you home?
[03:13.61]Who’s gonna drive you home?
[03:18.25]And I’m 80 miles from going insane
[03:21.69]I’ve been missing, missing those days
[03:24.30]So baby let me love you
[03:28.51]So who’s gonna drive you home?
[03:28.862] 出版Published by: 王嘉尔 (KOMCA), Nick Mira Publishing (BMI), Sony ATV / Stellar Songs (BMI), Songs by Amnija/Songs of Universal (BMI), UNIVERSAL TUNES (SESAC) obo LIDO MUSIC, INC. (SESAC)
[03:29.673] 录音Recorded by: Isaac Han
[03:30.484] 录音室Recorded at: 8pex studios (Korea)
[03:31.295] 混音Mixed by: Tristan Hoogland
[03:32.106] 混音室Mixed at: Tristan Hogland (Los Angeles, CA)
[03:32.917] 母带Mastering Engineer: Dale Becker
[03:33.728] 母带助理Mastering Assistant: Hector Vega, Fili Filizzola, Connor Hedge
[03:34.539] 母带室Mastered at: Becker Mastering (Pasadena, CA)
[03:35.350] 发行公司：RYCE MUSIC GROUP 白米范（北京）文化传播有限公司
[03:36.161] 出品：TEAM WANG RECORDS
tlyric:
[by:维尔日记]
[00:08.85]驾车行驶在盖瑞大道上 我们深陷爱河
[00:13.40]望着远方 阳光倾洒而下
[00:18.28]此景就像 80年代的电影画面
[00:23.27]也似你不会弃我而去
[00:28.45]但为何 我们的感情 被迫告终
[00:31.63]究竟怎么回事
[00:32.45]我对自身的了解 都不及你
[00:34.52]我不愿孤身回家
[00:36.55]毕竟没有你的陪伴
[00:37.42]我会很心痛
[00:39.23]所有路标都指向你心间
[00:43.35]今夜 我定不会离开你身旁
[00:46.27]不今夜 我定会留下
[00:48.63]当你疯狂挥霍一日 
[00:53.06]谁将载你 踏上归途
[00:58.50]当你泪如雨下
[01:03.55]谁将为你 擦拭泪痕
[01:06.20]当你潸然泪下
[01:08.87]我们就像生活在 自制的影片中
[01:13.54]却倒带回最低谷
[01:18.31]但在我看来 我们能逆转局势
[01:23.29]我也认为 你我会圆满
[01:28.48]但为何 我们的感情 被迫告终
[01:31.56]究竟怎么回事
[01:32.42]我对自身的了解 都不及你
[01:34.34]我不愿孤身回家
[01:36.41]毕竟没有你的陪伴
[01:37.38]我会很心痛
[01:39.17]所有路标都指向你心间
[01:43.32]今夜 我定不会离开你身旁
[01:46.34]不今夜 我定会留下
[01:48.39]当你疯狂挥霍一日
[01:53.54]谁将载你 踏上归途
[01:58.53]当你泪如雨下
[02:03.45]谁将为你 擦拭泪痕
[02:06.06]当你潸然泪下
[02:08.34]当你疯狂挥霍一日
[02:13.61]谁将载你 踏上归途
[02:18.30]80英里渐行渐远 我趋近疯狂
[02:21.56]不禁怀念起 那段时光
[02:24.03]亲爱的 就让我爱着你吧
[02:28.36]驾车行驶在盖瑞大道上 我们深陷爱河
[02:33.54]难以自拔
[02:38.53]或许再兜转一轮 结果就能好些吧
[02:43.42]当你坐在副驾上 牵着我的手
[02:48.69]当你疯狂挥霍一日
[02:53.37]谁将载你 踏上归途
[02:58.58]当你泪如雨下
[03:03.29]谁将为你 擦拭泪痕
[03:06.27]当你潸然泪下
[03:08.41]当你疯狂挥霍一日
[03:13.61]谁将载你 踏上归途
[03:18.25]80英里渐行渐远 我趋近疯狂
[03:21.69]不禁怀念起 那段时光
[03:24.30]亲爱的 就让我爱着你吧
[03:28.51]当你疯狂挥霍一日 谁将载你 踏上归途
